newsitem.title: USA: Calif. $71 mln housing bonds repriced, yields cut.
newsitem.headline: Calif. $71 mln housing bonds repriced, yields cut.

text.p: Lehman Brothers said Tuesday it repriced its California Housing Finance Agency bond deal, lowering yields.
Multi Family Housing Revenue Bonds III
ALL BONDS ARE PRICED AT PAR.

1. The 1997 Series A Term Bonds due 2/1/28 and 2/1/38 are not (as all 1997 series A Bonds are not) subject to redemption from mortgage prepayments from any mortgages other than the mortgages financed with 1997 Series A Bond Proceeds.
2. The 1997 Series A Term Bonds due 2/1/28 and 2/1/38 are not subject to redemption from excess revenues prior to 2/1/2002.
3. The 1997 Series A Term Bonds due 2/1/28 are not subject to redemption from mortgage default proceeds or unexpended proceeds until all of the 1997 Series A Term Bonds due 8/1/28 have been retired.
4. The 1997 Series A Term Bonds due 2/1/38 are not subject to redemption from mortgage default proceeds or unexpended proceeds until all of the 1997 Series A Term Bonds due 8/1/38 have been retired.
The compliance addendum MSRB Rule G-11 will apply.
The award is expected Thursday, February 27 1997.
This issue is book entry. DTC is pending.
E.J. De La Rosa & Co., Inc.
